name: Notion for Teachers: Classroom Tools
description: A suite of digital tools for your classroom, all on one Notion page which you can duplicate to your own workspace and use on any Notion page you desire.Included are my:Classroom Timers including link to my video for how to generate a timer for ANY duration.Random Number GeneratorRandom Letter GeneratorDie Roller2-Dice Roller
features: Classroom Timers including link to my video for how to generate a timer forANYduration.; Random Number Generator; Random Letter Generator; 2-Dice Roller
